languages.text: "Я видал{mf||а} немало таких же грешниц, как ты — оправдывающих свои деяния службой Империуму. Знаешь, что вас отличает от истиных праведников? Боязнь трудностей и боли. Только ими можно пройти стезей Его. Исповедуйся мне — и я укажу ее тебе".

"I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."
languages.original_text: "Я видал{mf||а} немало таких же грешниц, как ты — оправдывающих свои деяния службой Империуму. Знаешь, что вас отличает от истиных праведников? Боязнь трудностей и боли. Только ими можно пройти стезей Его. Исповедуйся мне — и я укажу ее тебе".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

"I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

"I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

"I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

languages.text: 「あなたのような違反者を多く見てきた。自分たちの行いを帝国への奉仕と主張して言い訳する。あなたと真に正しい者との違いを知ってるか？苦難と痛みへの恐れだ。彼の道を歩むことができるのはただそれだけだ。告白せよ。そうすればどのように示すかをお見せしよう」
languages.original_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのような違反者を多く見てきた。自分たちの行いを帝国への奉仕と主張して言い訳する。あなたと真に正しい者との違いを知ってるか？苦難と痛みへの恐れだ。彼の道を歩むことができるのはただそれだけだ。告白せよ。そうすればどのように示すかをお見せしよう」

languages.text: « J'ai connu de nombreux transgresseurs comme vous qui légitimaient leurs actions en affirmant qu'ils rendaient service à l'Imperium. Mais vous savez pourquoi vous n'êtes pas une personne vertueuse ? Vous craignez les difficultés et la douleur. Mais pour arpenter Sa voie, il ne faut pas tenter de se dérober à elles. Confessez-vous, et je vous apprendrais. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

traits.locale_text: J'ai connu de nombreux transgresseurs comme vous qui légitimaient leurs actions en affirmant qu'ils rendaient service à l'Imperium. Mais vous savez pourquoi vous n'êtes pas une personne vertueuse ? Vous craignez les difficultés et la douleur. Mais pour arpenter Sa voie, il ne faut pas tenter de se dérober à elles. Confessez-vous, et je vous apprendrais. »

languages.text: “我见过很多像你这样踏上邪路的人，他们每个人都用为帝国的责任自我开脱。你知道你们这些人和真正的正义之士有什么区别吗？你们害怕困难，害怕痛苦，然而只有通过艰难困苦，才能真正踏上帝皇的道路。忏悔吧，我可以告诉你该怎么做。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

traits.locale_text: “我见过很多像你这样踏上邪路的人，他们每个人都用为帝国的责任自我开脱。你知道你们这些人和真正的正义之士有什么区别吗？你们害怕困难，害怕痛苦，然而只有通过艰难困苦，才能真正踏上帝皇的道路。忏悔吧，我可以告诉你该怎么做。”

languages.text: «He conocido a incontables pecadores como usted que excusan sus actos con los beneficios que han aportado al Imperium. ¿Sabe en qué se diferencian usted y los siervos de bien? La aversión que siente a las vicisitudes y el dolor. Solo a través de ellos podemos hallar su camino. Confiese y le enseñaré a hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

traits.locale_text: «He conocido a incontables pecadores como usted que excusan sus actos con los beneficios que han aportado al Imperium. ¿Sabe en qué se diferencian usted y los siervos de bien? La aversión que siente a las vicisitudes y el dolor. Solo a través de ellos podemos hallar su camino. Confiese y le enseñaré a hacerlo».

languages.text: "Ich habe schon viele Übeltäter wie Euch gesehen, die ihre Taten mit ihrem Dienst am Imperium rechtfertigen. Kennt Ihr den Unterschied zwischen Euch und den wirklich Rechtschaffenen? Eure Furcht vor Mühsal und Schmerz. Nur durch sie können wir seinen Pfad beschreiten. Gesteht, dann lehre ich es Euch."
languages.original_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe schon viele Übeltäter wie Euch gesehen, die ihre Taten mit ihrem Dienst am Imperium rechtfertigen. Kennt Ihr den Unterschied zwischen Euch und den wirklich Rechtschaffenen? Eure Furcht vor Mühsal und Schmerz. Nur durch sie können wir seinen Pfad beschreiten. Gesteht, dann lehre ich es Euch."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'a hizmet ettiğini iddia ederek amellerini aklamaya çalışan nice günahkâr gördüm senin gibi. Hakikaten erdemlilerle arandaki fark ne biliyor musun? Sen cefa ve acıya katlanamıyorsun. Yalnız cefa ve acı sayesinde O'nun yolunda ilerleyebiliriz. İtiraf et de nasıl olduğunu göstereyim."
languages.original_text: "I have seen many transgressors like you who excuse their deeds with claims about their service to the Imperium. Do you know the difference between you and the truly righteous? Your fear of hardship and pain. It is only through them that we can tread His path. Confess, and I will show you how."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'a hizmet ettiğini iddia ederek amellerini aklamaya çalışan nice günahkâr gördüm senin gibi. Hakikaten erdemlilerle arandaki fark ne biliyor musun? Sen cefa ve acıya katlanamıyorsun. Yalnız cefa ve acı sayesinde O'nun yolunda ilerleyebiliriz. İtiraf et de nasıl olduğunu göstereyim."
